item.title: YaleUniversity - Yale College 2023 Baccalaureate Ceremony
item.description: Video Transcript Welcome, everybody. Mr. President, Mr. Provost, Madam Secretary, college deans, colleagues, friends, families, move all, members of the class of 2023. Welcome to this day and congratulations. [Cheers and Applause] I call on the University Chaplain. » SHARON KUGLER: With deep gratitude to the Quinnipiac ople for this land on ich stand, my beloved Yale Family, I invite you to join me in the spirit of prayer. Almighty and loving God, you are
